sections.title: Welcome to Dataland
text: This is the main introduction of our homepage.

cards.text: Search for a company to view or request data...

cards.title: Sven Schubert
cards.text: CEO of Envoria
cards.date: "Dataland is the only platform we know that is open to everyone and based on a non-profit business model."

cards.title: Dr. Egbert Schark
cards.text:
Founder and Managing Director
 at d-fine GmbH
cards.date: "I believe the fascinating idea is worth supporting. Join the mission! Join Dataland!"

cards.title: Daniel Sailer
cards.text:
Head of Sustainable Investment Office
 at Metzler Asset Management GmbH
cards.date: "The Pathways to Paris PoC can be a simple way to make sure Dataland becomes the data platform you need."

cards.title: Dr. Anna-Lisa Schwarz
cards.text: Managing Director at Werte-Stiftung
cards.date: "Dataland will help solve data issues by ensuring transparent, open and fair access to sustainability data."

cards.title: Rudolf Siebel
cards.text: Managing Director at BVI German Fund Association
cards.date: "[Through Dataland], we hope that data availability, coverage and quality is improved, for the benefit of the users, the corporations and society overall."

cards.title: Stephan Henkel
cards.text: Managing Directer at VÖB-Service GmbH
cards.date: "Then came Dataland with the idea that ESG data should be a common good, and I think that's excellent [...]."

cards.title: Jasmina Klein
cards.text: Manager at d-fine
cards.date: "[Dataland] will help to let the data flow and this is the key to solve one of the most pressing issues of our time."

cards.title: Matthias Kopp
cards.text: Director of Sustainable Finance at WWF Germany
cards.date: "Dataland can provide the data ecosystem we all need [to support our] transition to stay within 1.5 degrees or within the planetary boundaries."

cards.title: Christian Heller
cards.text: CEO of Value Balancing Alliance
cards.date: "Join Dataland, share your data, and make use of it to transform the economy into a just and sustainable one."

cards.title: Fabian Klose
cards.text:
Cloud Services Sales
 at T-Systems International
cards.date: "Have a look at Dataland and look at what benefits you can get out of it for your business. Join the community!"

cards.title: Ingo Speich
cards.text:
Head of Sustainability & Corporate Governance
 at Deka Investment
cards.date: "We appeal to both investors and companies to make sustainability data available in a timely and cost-efficient manner."

cards.title: Christoph Benner
cards.text: CEO of Chom Capital
cards.date: "Our partnership with Dataland is instrumental in progressively addressing and bridging data gaps."

cards.title: Data Gaps
cards.text: Smaller and unlisted companies are often left out of the existing data offering, shifting the burden of acquiring this data to the data consumers.

cards.title: Quality Issues
cards.text: Inaccurate, inconsistent, or outdated data jeopardizes the integrity of analytics and decision processes, leading to misguided strategies.

cards.title: Usage Restrictions
cards.text: Companies are quite limited in how they can use the data they acquired, hindering many valuable applications of this data.

cards.title: High Price
cards.text: Data is becoming more and more expensive, limiting access to essential information for many organizations.

cards.title: Search
cards.text: Utilize the search feature to find specific companies within the platform.

cards.title: Request company’s inclusion
cards.text: Request company’s inclusion in case you can’t find the company you are looking for.

cards.title: Request framework data
cards.text: Join a campaign to get the missing data.

cards.title: Download
cards.text: Download either through the platform or through API.

sections.title: Join a campaign
text: The campaigns are a simple way for you to get better data coverage and improved data quality, while testing Dataland.

cards.title: Pathways to Paris
cards.text: Captures companies’ progress on Paris-compatible transformation paths that are necessary to achieve the goals of the Paris climate protection agreement.

cards.title: LkSG
cards.text: The Lieferkettensorgfalts-pflichtengesetz is a German law requiring companies to monitor human rights and environmental risks in their supply chains.

cards.title: EU Taxonomy
cards.text: The EU Taxonomy Regulation supports companies to capture their environmentally sustainable economic activities.

cards.title: SFDR
cards.text: SFDR helps investors to properly assess how sustainability risks are integrated in the investment decision process.

cards.title: Your message
cards.text: Get in touch
cards.date: By clicking Get in Touch,  you agree to our Terms of use and that you have read our Privacy Policy.

cards.title: Erik Breen,
cards.text: Managing Director of Dataland

cards.title: Campaigns on Dataland
cards.text:
Hello Erik,
 
I recently visited Dataland and I'm interested in the campaigns on Dataland.
Could you please provide me with information regarding:
1.      Each framework
2.      How I can get the data for a certain company

If you have any upcoming events or newsletters, I'd love to know about those too.

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]

cards.title: Inquiry about Dataland: Shortest way to fill data gaps and improve data quality
cards.text:
Hello Erik,
 
I recently visited Dataland and I'm interested in learning more about your platform, its features, and how I can get involved.

Could you please provide me with information regarding:
1.      The purpose and mission of your website.
2.      Key functionalities and features.
3.      The different frameworks
4.      How can I get data / provide data

If you have any upcoming events or newsletters, I'd love to know about those too.

Feel free to reply to this email or share the best way to get in touch.

Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]

cards.title: Owned by:
cards.text: A Werte-Stiftung Company

sections.title: START YOUR DATALAND JOURNEY
text: Our joint purpose, promise & passion is to

cards.title: Integrity
cards.text: We need comparable and reliable sustainability data to create value.

cards.title: Disclosure
cards.text: We will seek disclosure of sustainability data from our business relations.

cards.title: Transparency
cards.text: We will respect and promote data soveignty.

cards.title: Accountability
cards.text: Data should be timely and easliy accessible at fair cost.

cards.title: Neutrality
cards.text: Common data spaces should be neutral, transparent, non-competitive and not-for-profit.

cards.title: Collaboration
cards.text: We will work together to achieve these principles and promote their acceptance.

cards.title: Interested in becoming a premium user
cards.text:
Hi Erik,

I'd like to receive some information about the premium user role on Dataland.
Thank you, and I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
[Your Email Address]
[Your Phone Number]
